abstract: As Berkshire Hathaway shareholders come out in droves this weekend for an audience with the Oracle of Omaha, Warren Buffett is likely to face questions about his seeming support of Goldman Sachs, Reuters writes.
snippet: As Berkshire Hathaway shareholders come out in droves this weekend for an audience with the Oracle of Omaha, Warren Buffett is likely to face questions about his seeming support of Goldman Sachs, Reuters writes.
lead_paragraph: As shareholders of Berkshire Hathaway descend on Omaha, Nebraska, this weekend for its annual meeting on Saturday, Warren E. Buffett is sure to bask in the goodwill he has engendered in 45 years at the helm of Berkshire, but the world’s third-richest person always gets questions about things he could do differently.

headline.main: Buffett to Face Goldman Questions at Annual Gala
